resources.string: This sample allows you to receive location updates while using the app. \n\n In order for this feature to work, please approve access to your location via the button below.
This sample allows you to receive location updates in the background. \n\n In order for this feature to work, please approve access to your location via the button below.
The fine location permission is needed for core functionality.
Fine location permission was denied, but is needed for core functionality.
The background location permission is needed for enhanced functionality.
Background location permission was denied but needed for enhanced functionality.
